articles.description: Ripley’s Believe It or Not! defended loaning Monroe’s ‘Happy Birthday’ gown to the reality TV star and said its importance ‘has not been negated, but rather highlighted’
articles.content:
The owners of the dress belonging to Marilyn Monroe and worn by Kim Kardashian at last months Met ball have hit back against allegations the dress was damaged by the loan.

articles.author: Laura Fox, Amelia Wynne
articles.title: Harry Styles' teacher Mrs Vernon lauds the singer's 'lovely tribute' to her at his concert - Daily Mail
articles.description: Speaking on Friday's Lorraine, Mrs Vernon admitted that she wasn't actually present at the concert where the star paid tribute, but was told about it by one of her colleagues.
articles.content:
Harry Styles teacher Mrs Vernon has lauded the singer's 'lovely tribute' after he halted his concern at Old Trafford to dedicate a song to her.
